text.title: part1_BDSM as business: Interviews with Dominatrixes

p.hi: DS : Does BDSM turn you on ?

text.p:
Alex :
The majority of the time I do n’t get any sexual pleasure out of it . There are going to be times in session because of the way I ’m dressed …

p.hi: DS : Outside of work is it something that is an interest of yours ?

text.p:
Alex :
A little bit , but definitely not the majority of time .

p.hi: DS : Did it start out that it was a turn-on and then you just moved on ?

text.p:
Alex :
Yeah , because I ’m very experimental by nature . I love learning about things , and I imagine you are the same way because you do all this research on different topics !

p.hi:
DS : True ; tomorrow I ’m talking to a
Presidential candidate
and the President of the ACLU .

text.p:
Alex :
[
Laughs
] I would love for you to
combine
these two things and bring
in
that
Republican candidate
here , and then perhaps we could…somehow it would be very satisfying .

p.hi: DS : So BDSM is something that you had a curiosity about , experienced it , you realized you had a talent , and made it into a profession ?

text.p:
Alex :
I realized I was good at it and I enjoyed it ; I enjoyed the variety and the different people I was hanging out with , people like Jada . It ’s much better than just playing .

p.hi: DS : How did you start , Jada ?

text.p:
Jada :
I always had an interest in
S&M
. As a teenager it was one of those things that I did n’t know exactly what it was , but I was always into the fetish , the kink , the tying up , the doing all sorts of different things . Then I was in a relationship where there was no communication . It was going down the toilet [
giggles
] .

p.hi: DS : Was it an S&M relationship ?

text.p:
Jada :
Just a regular relationship . There was no communication going on , nothing happening , no intimacy , and after awhile we were literally at the point where we were going to break up . I was going to break up with him , and then he told me had a
bondage fetish
. So I was like , “ Fine , okay ! That ’s perfect , if that ’s the only problem that you have , you know , let ’s do this ! ”

p.hi:
DS : Is that
why
things were going down the toilet , because he had that desire and he would n’t express it ?

text.p:
Jada :
Yes , he had expressed it in previous relationships , and because he expressed it he was seen as a freak . “ How dare you ! That ’s the equivalent of rape ! ”

p.hi: DS : So he learned not to express it and that caused him to not communicate …
DS : And he just assumed you were somebody who —
